#Assign different country
```{r}
environment1$Country <- "all"

environment1$Country[environment1$Manufacturer %in% c("Toyota","Mazda","Honda","Subaru","Nissan")] <- "Japan"

environment1$Country[environment1$Manufacturer %in% c("BMW","Mercedes","VW")] <- "German"

environment1$Country[environment1$Manufacturer %in% c("GM","Ford","Tesla","FCA")] <- "America"

environment1$Country[environment1$Manufacturer %in% c("Hyundai","Kia")] <- "Korea"

```


```{r}
fit1 <- lm(Real.World.CO2 ~ Country + Year + Weight + Footprint + Horsepower + Fuel.Delivery.GDI + Engine.Displacement, data = environment1)
summary(fit1)
#Manufacturer +
```


```{r}
step(fit1, direction = "backward")
```


```{r}
#environment1$Country <- as.factor(environment1$Country)
fit2 <- lm(Real.World.CO2 ~ Country + Weight + Fuel.Delivery.GDI, data = environment1)
summary(fit2)
```


#Assumption
```{r}
mplot(fit1, which = 1)
mplot(fit1, which = 2)
```
